Text:
IMPORTANT!!

Missed Languages, such as En, Fr, De is here:

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7704879

If you have troubles with this RePack, try fixed Version here 

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7706578/

Some users reply, that they having troubles with setup.

If installation crashes, you may just install FreeArc. Than rename data0.bin and data2.bin to data0.arc and data2.arc. Then just unpack archives and play the game.

Again, in case setup.exe failed ...

Does someone else gets the “game.exe stopped working” Error when trying to get to Westgate Prison (or if you don’t go there, after that to Wharf 321 also)?

Please help! Thank you very much!
I get the same error, both in this version and the skidrow iso version... I hope this problem will be fixed soon?
need a PROPER version since this version and Skidrow crashes when you go to westgate prison
skidrow update fixes wharf crash. post reply if prison crash is fixed
